casebody.data:
Gary R. HERBERT, Governor of Utah, et al., applicants,
v.
Derek KITCHEN, et al. No. 13A687. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 6, 2014.

Application for stay presented to Justice SOTOMAYOR and by her referred to the Court granted. Permanent injunction issued by the United States District Court for the District of Utah, case No. 2:13-cv-217, on December 20, 2013, stayed pending final disposition of the appeal by the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
